name: Tunnel Roll
description:
The most addictive game!
Tunnel Space combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different planets of solar system, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different experience. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody when you enter the slow motion effect, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better.
Come on! Enter the space tunnel and roll to the gems to score. Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprise and wonders every time you play.
Gameplay:
1. Original background music
2. Endless gameplay with increasing difficulty with unique space environments
3. Very simple gameplay with only one finger switch
4. Music is key to guide you
Support:

SOULGAME is now sincerely inviting all the amazing mobile game developers globally to achieve mutual success! we are looking forward to the great games! Contact us on: pub@yomob.com
